tool_description: Creates hierarchical course structures with modules, lessons, and learning objectives, establishing the foundational organization for course content.

course_title.description: The main title of the course

course_description.description: Detailed description of the course content and goals

module_titles.description: List of module titles in sequential order

error_messages: Invalid duration: duration_weeks must be between 1 and 52.
Empty module list: At least one module title is required.
Invalid difficulty level: Use beginner, intermediate, or advanced.
Module title too long: Each module title must be under 100 characters.
usage: Provide course_title, course_description, duration_weeks, and module_titles to create the basic course structure. Optionally specify difficulty_level.

course_id.description: Unique identifier for the created course

structure_summary.description: Overview of the course structure created

module_ids.description: List of unique identifiers for each module

estimated_hours.description: Estimated total course duration in hours
